de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities

Class Base64

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.Base64

  • public final class Base64
extends Object
    Class to wrap various Base64 encoders that could be available. This is a rather ugly hack; it would maybe have been sensible to just import one of the publicly available (and fast) Base64 encoders. The expectation was that at some point, Oracle will actually include a public and fast Base64 encoder in Java...
